Package Utilities

Class InputValidation

  • java.lang.Object
    • Utilities.InputValidation
  • public class InputValidation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles various validations that may be used in multiple locations throughout the application

      • validatePartInputs

        public static boolean validatePartInputs​(java.lang.String name,
                                         java.lang.String inventory,
                                         java.lang.String priceCost,
                                         java.lang.String max,
                                         java.lang.String min,
                                         java.lang.String uniqueAttribute,
                                         java.lang.String partType)
        This validation method is used to verify user inputs to add or modify a part
        Parameters:
        name - part name
        inventory - part inventory
        priceCost - part price/cost
        max - part maximum inventory
        min - part minimum inventory
        uniqueAttribute - part machine id (InHouse) or company name (Outsourced)
        partType - designates whether part is made InHouse or is Outsourced
        Returns:
        boolean

      • validateProductInputs

        public static boolean validateProductInputs​(java.lang.String name,
                                            java.lang.String inventory,
                                            java.lang.String priceCost,
                                            java.lang.String max,
                                            java.lang.String min,
                                            javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> productParts,
                                            javafx.stage.Stage currentStage)
        This validation method is used to verify user inputs to add or modify a product
        Parameters:
        name - product name
        inventory - product inventory
        priceCost - product price/cost
        max - product maximum inventory level
        min - product minimum inventory level
        productParts - the products associated parts
        currentStage - current stage to determine if associated parts can be empty or not
        Returns:
        boolean
